TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit CharUnicodeInfo extends System.Object
public ref class CharUnicodeInfo abstract sealed

summary.span: 检索关于 Unicode 字符的信息。

span.span: Retrieves information about a Unicode character.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks [Unicode 标准](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37123)定义数量的 Unicode 字符类别。The [Unicode Standard](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37123) defines a number of Unicode character categories. 例如，字符可能属于一个大写字母、 小写字母、 十进制数、 以字母数字、 段落分隔符、 数学符号或货币符号。For example, a character might be categorized as an uppercase letter, a lowercase letter, a decimal digit number, a letter number, a paragraph separator, a math symbol, or a currency symbol. 你的应用程序可以使用的字符类别来控制基于字符串的操作，如分析或提取子字符串与正则表达式。Your application can use the character category to govern string-based operations, such as parsing or extracting substring with regular expressions. 枚举定义可能的字符类别。The enumeration defines the possible character categories. 您使用类来获取特定字符的值。You use the class to obtain the value for a specific character. 类定义返回以下 Unicode 字符值的方法：The class defines methods that return the following Unicode character values: - 字符或代理项对所属的特定类别。The specific category to which a character or surrogate pair belongs. 返回的值是的成员枚举。The value returned is a member of the enumeration. - 数值。Numeric value. 仅适用于数字字符，包括小数部分、 下标、 上标、 罗马数字、 货币分子、 循环的数和特定于脚本的数字。Applies only to numeric characters, including fractions, subscripts, superscripts, Roman numerals, currency numerators, encircled numbers, and script-specific digits. - 数字值。Digit value. 适用于可以组合使用以其他数字的字符编号系统中表示为整数的数字字符。Applies to numeric characters that can be combined with other numeric characters to represent a whole number in a numbering system. - 十进制数字值。Decimal digit value. 仅适用于十进制 (基数为 10) 系统中表示十进制数字的字符。Applies only to characters that represent decimal digits in the decimal (base 10) system. 十进制数字可以是从 0 到 9 的十个数字之一。A decimal digit can be one of ten digits, from zero through nine. 这些字符均隶属于类别。These characters are members of the category. 此外，类在内部使用的其他.NET Framework 类型和依赖于字符分类的方法数。In addition, the class is used internally by a number of other .NET Framework types and methods that rely on character classification. 这些方法包括：These include: - 类，该类适用于文本元素而不是字符串中的单个字符。The class, which works with textual elements instead of single characters in a string. - 重载方法，确定一个字符或代理项对所属的类别。The overloads of the method, which determine the category to which a character or surrogate pair belongs. - [字符类](~/docs/standard/base-types/character-classes-in-regular-expressions.md)识别的，.NET Framework 正则表达式引擎。The [character classes](~/docs/standard/base-types/character-classes-in-regular-expressions.md) recognized by , the .NET Framework's regular expression engine. 时使用此类应用程序中，请记住以下有关使用编程注意事项类型。When using this class in your applications, keep in mind the following programming considerations for using the type. 类型可能很难使用，以及字符串表示语言的内容通常更好。The type can be difficult to use, and strings are generally preferable for representing linguistic content. - 一个对象并不始终对应于单个字符。A object does not always correspond to a single character. 尽管类型表示单个 16 位值时，某些字符 （如字形群集和代理项对） 包含的两个或多个 utf-16 代码单元。Although the type represents a single 16-bit value, some characters (such as grapheme clusters and surrogate pairs) consist of two or more UTF-16 code units. 详细信息，请参阅"Char 对象和 Unicode 字符"中类。For more information, see "Char Objects and Unicode Characters" in the class. - 为"character"的概念也是灵活的。The notion of a "character" is also flexible. 字符通常看作标志符号，但很多行标志符号需要多个码位。A character is often thought of as a glyph, but many glyphs require multiple code points. 例如，可以是 ä 表示通过两个代码点 （"a"以及 U + 0308，这是组合分音符） 或通过一个单独的码位 （"ä"或 U + 00A4）。For example, ä can be represented either by two code points ("a" plus U+0308, which is the combining diaeresis), or by a single code point ("ä" or U+00A4). 某些语言有很多字母、 字符和需要多个码位，可能会造成混淆语言内容的表示形式中的标志符号。Some languages have many letters, characters, and glyphs that require multiple code points, which can cause confusion in linguistic content representation. 例如，没有 ΰ （U + 03B0、 希腊文小写字母 upsilon dialytika 和音调符号），但没有任何等效的大写字母。For example, there is a ΰ (U+03B0, Greek small letter upsilon with dialytika and tonos), but there is no equivalent capital letter. 大写这样的值只是检索原始值。Uppercasing such a value simply retrieves the original value. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示了不同类型的字符为每个方法返回的值。The following code example shows the values returned by each method for different types of characters. [!code-cpp[System.Globalization.CharUnicodeInfo_Char#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.CharUnicodeInfo_Char/CPP/charunicodeinfo_char.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.CharUnicodeInfo_Char#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.CharUnicodeInfo_Char/CS/charunicodeinfo_char.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.CharUnicodeInfo_Char#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.CharUnicodeInfo_Char/VB/charunicodeinfo_char.vb#1)]

para.span: 可识别的字符和其所属的特定类别由 Unicode 标准定义，并可以从 Unicode 标准的一个版本更改为另一个。

span.span: Recognized characters and the specific categories to which they belong are defined by the Unicode standard and can change from one version of the Unicode Standard to another.

para.span: 分类的特定版本的.NET framework 中的字符基于 Unicode 标准，无论什么基础操作系统在其运行.NET Framework 的一个版本。

span.span: Categorization of characters in a particular version of the .NET Framework is based on a single version of the Unicode Standard regardless of the underlying operating system on which the .NET Framework is running.

para.span: 下表列出了版本以来的.NET Framework[!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]和 Unicode 标准版本用于对字符进行分类。

span.span: The following table lists versions of the .NET Framework since the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)] and the versions of the Unicode Standard used to classify characters.
.NET Framework version
Version of the Unicode Standard
[The Unicode Standard, Version 5.0.0](https://www.unicode.org/versions/Unicode5.0.0/)
[The Unicode Standard, Version 5.0.0](https://www.unicode.org/versions/Unicode5.0.0/)
[The Unicode Standard, Version 5.0.0](https://www.unicode.org/versions/Unicode5.0.0/)
[The Unicode Standard, Version 5.0.0](https://www.unicode.org/versions/Unicode5.0.0/)
[The Unicode Standard, Version 6.3.0](https://www.unicode.org/versions/Unicode6.3.0/)
[The Unicode Standard, Version 6.3.0](https://www.unicode.org/versions/Unicode6.3.0/)
[The Unicode Standard, Version 8.0.0](https://www.unicode.org/versions/Unicode8.0.0/)

para.span: 每个版本的 Unicode 标准包含自上一个版本更改为 Unicode 字符数据库的信息。

span.span: Each version of the Unicode standard includes information on changes to the Unicode character database since the previous version.

para.span: 使用 Unicode 字符数据库类用于对字符进行分类。

span.span: The Unicode character database is used by the class for categorizing characters.

summary.span: 获取数值型 Unicode 字符的十进制数字值。

span.span: Gets the decimal digit value of a numeric Unicode character.

MemberSignature.Value: public static int GetDecimalDigitValue (char ch);
.method public static hidebysig int32 GetDecimalDigitValue(char ch) cil managed
Public Shared Function GetDecimalDigitValue (ch As Char) As Integer
public: static int GetDecimalDigitValue(char ch);
static member GetDecimalDigitValue : char -> int

param.name: ch
param.span: 要获取其十进制数字值的 Unicode 字符。

span.span: The Unicode character for which to get the decimal digit value.

summary.span: 获取指定数值型字符的十进制数字值。

span.span: Gets the decimal digit value of the specified numeric character.

returns.span: 指定数值型字符的十进制数字值。

span.span: The decimal digit value of the specified numeric character.

returns.span: 或

span.span: -or-

returns.span: 如果指定字符不是十进制数字，则为 -1。

span.span: -1, if the specified character is not a decimal digit.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法将转换为其等效的整数值表示十进制数字的字符。This method converts characters that represent decimal digits to their equivalent integral values. 小数位数为字符的可以表示一个十进制 (基数为 10) 编号系统，从 0 到 9 的十位的类别。Decimal digits are characters in the category that can represent one of ten digits in the decimal (base 10) numbering system, from zero through nine. 它通过 U + 1049年 （包括字符，如 U + 0030-u （数字零） 到 U + 0039 (数字 9)，U + 0660 通过 U + 0669 (阿拉伯-印度文数字 9)，U + 07 C 0 （NKO 数字零） 到 U + 07C 9 (NKO 数字 9) 和 U + 1040 （缅甸数字零） （阿拉伯-印度文数字零）缅甸数字 9 个）。It includes characters such as U+0030 (DIGIT ZERO) through U+0039 (DIGIT NINE), U+0660 (ARABIC-INDIC DIGIT ZERO) through U+0669 (ARABIC-INDIC DIGIT NINE), U+07C0 (NKO DIGIT ZERO) through U+07C9 (NKO DIGIT NINE), and U+1040 (MYANMAR DIGIT ZERO) through U+1049 (MYANMAR DIGIT NINE). 有关 Unicode 字符的详细信息，请参阅[Unicode 标准](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37123)。For more information about Unicode characters, see the [Unicode Standard](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37123). ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示了不同类型的字符为每个方法返回的值。The following code example shows the values returned by each method for different types of characters. [!code-cpp[System.Globalization.CharUnicodeInfo_Char#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.CharUnicodeInfo_Char/CPP/charunicodeinfo_char.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.CharUnicodeInfo_Char#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.CharUnicodeInfo_Char/CS/charunicodeinfo_char.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.CharUnicodeInfo_Char#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.CharUnicodeInfo_Char/VB/charunicodeinfo_char.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法将转换为其等效的整数值表示十进制数字的字符。This method converts characters that represent decimal digits to their equivalent integral values. 小数位数为字符的可以表示一个十进制 (基数为 10) 编号系统，从 0 到 9 的十位的类别。Decimal digits are characters in the category that can represent one of ten digits in the decimal (base 10) numbering system, from zero through nine. 它通过 U + 1049年 （包括字符，如 U + 0030-u （数字零） 到 U + 0039 (数字 9)，U + 0660 通过 U + 0669 (阿拉伯-印度文数字 9)，U + 07 C 0 （NKO 数字零） 到 U + 07C 9 (NKO 数字 9) 和 U + 1040 （缅甸数字零） （阿拉伯-印度文数字零）缅甸数字 9 个）。It includes characters such as U+0030 (DIGIT ZERO) through U+0039 (DIGIT NINE), U+0660 (ARABIC-INDIC DIGIT ZERO) through U+0669 (ARABIC-INDIC DIGIT NINE), U+07C0 (NKO DIGIT ZERO) through U+07C9 (NKO DIGIT NINE), and U+1040 (MYANMAR DIGIT ZERO) through U+1049 (MYANMAR DIGIT NINE). 有关 Unicode 字符的详细信息，请参阅[Unicode 标准](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37123)。For more information about Unicode characters, see the [Unicode Standard](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37123). ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示了不同类型的字符为每个方法返回的值。The following code example shows the values returned by each method for different types of characters. [!code-cpp[System.Globalization.CharUnicodeInfo_String#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.CharUnicodeInfo_String/CPP/charunicodeinfo_string.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.CharUnicodeInfo_String#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.CharUnicodeInfo_String/CS/charunicodeinfo_string.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.CharUnicodeInfo_String#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.CharUnicodeInfo_String/VB/charunicodeinfo_string.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 数字值是一个属性，它仅适用于可用作数字的数字字符。Digit value is a property that applies only to numeric characters that can be used as digits. 一个数字是可以结合其他数字编号系统中表示为整数的数字字符。A digit is a numeric character that can be combined with other digits to represent a whole number in a numbering system. 有关 Unicode 字符的详细信息，请参阅[Unicode 标准](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37123)。For more information on Unicode characters, see the [Unicode Standard](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37123). ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示了不同类型的字符为每个方法返回的值。The following code example shows the values returned by each method for different types of characters. remarks.format: ## Remarks 数字值是一个属性，它仅适用于可用作数字的数字字符。Digit value is a property that applies only to numeric characters that can be used as digits. 一个数字是可以结合其他数字编号系统中表示为整数的数字字符。A digit is a numeric character that can be combined with other digits to represent a whole number in a numbering system. 有关 Unicode 字符的详细信息，请参阅[Unicode 标准](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37123)。For more information on Unicode characters, see the [Unicode Standard](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37123). ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示了不同类型的字符为每个方法返回的值。The following code example shows the values returned by each method for different types of characters. remarks.format: ## Remarks 数值为仅适用于数字字符，其中包括小数部分、 下标、 上标、 罗马数字、 货币分子、 循环的数和特定于脚本的数字 Unicode 字符属性。Numeric value is a Unicode character property that applies only to numeric characters, which include fractions, subscripts, superscripts, Roman numerals, currency numerators, encircled numbers, and script-specific digits. 有关 Unicode 字符的详细信息，请参阅[Unicode 标准](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37123)。For more information on Unicode characters, see the [Unicode Standard](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37123). 方法假设`ch`对应于单一语言字符，并检查该字符是否可以转换为十进制数字。The method assumes that `ch` corresponds to a single linguistic character and checks whether that character can be converted to a decimal digit. 但是，由两个表示 Unicode 标准中的某些数字形成一个代理项对的对象。However, some numbers in the Unicode standard are represented by two objects that form a surrogate pair. 例如，数字系统爱琴包含码位 U + 10107 至 U + 10133。For example, the Aegean numbering system consists of code points U+10107 through U+10133. 下面的示例使用方法可实例化一个字符串，表示爱琴海的第一个。The following example uses the method to instantiate a string that represents AEGEAN NUMBER ONE. 中的示例所示，输出的形式方法返回-1，如果它传递一个高代理项或低代理项的此字符。As the output from the example shows, the method returns -1 if it is passed either a high surrogate or a low surrogate of this character. [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.CharUnicodeInfo.GetNumericValue#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.globalization.charunicodeinfo.getnumericvalue/cs/getnumericvalue1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.CharUnicodeInfo.GetNumericValue#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.globalization.charunicodeinfo.getnumericvalue/vb/getnumericvalue1.vb#2)] ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示了不同类型的字符为每个方法返回的值。The following code example shows the values returned by each method for different types of characters. [!code-cpp[System.Globalization.CharUnicodeInfo_Char#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.CharUnicodeInfo_Char/CPP/charunicodeinfo_char.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.CharUnicodeInfo_Char#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.CharUnicodeInfo_Char/CS/charunicodeinfo_char.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.CharUnicodeInfo_Char#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.CharUnicodeInfo_Char/VB/charunicodeinfo_char.vb#1)]

returns.span: 如果位于指定字符串的指定索引处的字符不是数值型字符，则为 -1。

span.span: -1, if the character at the specified index of the specified string is not a numeric character.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 数值为仅适用于数字字符，其中包括小数部分、 下标、 上标、 罗马数字、 货币分子、 循环的数和特定于脚本的数字 Unicode 字符属性。Numeric value is a Unicode character property that applies only to numeric characters, which include fractions, subscripts, superscripts, Roman numerals, currency numerators, encircled numbers, and script-specific digits. 有关 Unicode 字符的详细信息，请参阅[Unicode 标准](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37123)。For more information on Unicode characters, see the [Unicode Standard](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37123). 如果位置处的对象`index`第一个字符是一个有效的代理项对，方法确定是否代理项对窗体数字，并且，如果是这样，返回其数值。If the object at position `index` is the first character of a valid surrogate pair, the method determines whether the surrogate pair forms a numeric digit, and, if it does, returns its numeric value. 例如，数字系统爱琴包含码位 U + 10107 至 U + 10133。For example, the Aegean numbering system consists of code points U+10107 through U+10133. 下面的示例使用方法可实例化一个字符串，表示每个爱琴海数目。The following example uses the method to instantiate a string that represents each Aegean number. 中的示例所示，输出的形式方法返回正确的数字值，如果它传递爱琴海的数目的高代理项。As the output from the example shows, the method returns the correct numeric value if it is passed the high surrogate of an Aegean number. 但是，如果它传递的低代理项，它会考虑仅在隔离的低代理项，并返回-1。However, if it is passed the low surrogate, it considers only the low surrogate in isolation and returns -1. [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.CharUnicodeInfo.GetNumericValue#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.globalization.charunicodeinfo.getnumericvalue/cs/getnumericvalue1.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.CharUnicodeInfo.GetNumericValue#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.globalization.charunicodeinfo.getnumericvalue/vb/getnumericvalue1.vb#3)] ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示了不同类型的字符为每个方法返回的值。The following code example shows the values returned by each method for different types of characters. [!code-cpp[System.Globalization.CharUnicodeInfo_String#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.CharUnicodeInfo_String/CPP/charunicodeinfo_string.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.CharUnicodeInfo_String#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.CharUnicodeInfo_String/CS/charunicodeinfo_string.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.CharUnicodeInfo_String#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.CharUnicodeInfo_String/VB/charunicodeinfo_string.vb#1)]

span.span: is .

exception.span: 超出 中的有效索引范围。

span.span: is outside the range of valid indexes in .

summary.span: 获取 Unicode 字符的 Unicode 类别。

span.span: Gets the Unicode category of a Unicode character.

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Globalization.UnicodeCategory GetUnicodeCategory (char ch);
.method public static hidebysig valuetype System.Globalization.UnicodeCategory GetUnicodeCategory(char ch) cil managed
Public Shared Function GetUnicodeCategory (ch As Char) As UnicodeCategory
public: static System::Globalization::UnicodeCategory GetUnicodeCategory(char ch);
static member GetUnicodeCategory : char -> System.Globalization.UnicodeCategory

param.name: ch
param.span: 要获取其 Unicode 类别的 Unicode 字符。

span.span: The Unicode character for which to get the Unicode category.

summary.span: 获取指定字符的 Unicode 类别。

span.span: Gets the Unicode category of the specified character.

returns.span: 指示指定字符类别的 值。

span.span: A value indicating the category of the specified character.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类别划分为 Unicode 字符。The Unicode characters are divided into categories. 字符的类别是其属性之一。A character's category is one of its properties. 例如，字符可能是一个大写字母、 小写字母、 十进制数、 以字母数字、 连接符标点、 数学符号或货币符号。For example, a character might be an uppercase letter, a lowercase letter, a decimal digit number, a letter number, a connector punctuation, a math symbol, or a currency symbol. 类返回的 Unicode 字符类别。The class returns the category of a Unicode character. 有关 Unicode 字符的详细信息，请参阅[Unicode 标准](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37123)。For more information on Unicode characters, see the [Unicode Standard](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37123). 方法假设`ch`对应于单一语言字符，并返回其类别。The method assumes that `ch` corresponds to a single linguistic character and returns its category. 这意味着，对于代理项对，它将返回而不是该代理项所属的类别。This means that, for surrogate pairs, it returns instead of the category to which the surrogate belongs. 例如，点滴字母表占用到 U + 1039F 码从 U + 10380。For example, the Ugaritic alphabet occupies code points U+10380 to U+1039F. 下面的示例使用方法可实例化一个字符串，表示 UGARITIC 字母 ALPA (从 U + 10380)，这是点滴字母表的第一个字母。The following example uses the method to instantiate a string that represents UGARITIC LETTER ALPA (U+10380), which is the first letter of the Ugaritic alphabet. 如示例所示，输出方法将返回`false`如果它传递的高代理项或此字符的低代理项。As the output from the example shows, the method returns `false` if it is passed either the high surrogate or the low surrogate of this character. [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.CharUnicodeInfo.GetUnicodeCategory#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.globalization.charunicodeinfo.getunicodecategory/cs/getunicodecategory1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.CharUnicodeInfo.GetUnicodeCategory#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.globalization.charunicodeinfo.getunicodecategory/vb/getunicodecategory1.vb#1)] 请注意，不会始终返回相同值作为方法时作为参数传递特定的字符。Note that does not always return the same value as the method when passed a particular character as a parameter. 方法设计以反映当前版本的 Unicode 标准。The method is designed to reflect the current version of the Unicode standard. 与此相反，尽管方法通常反映当前版本的 Unicode 标准，它可能会返回的字符类别基于以前版本的标准，或它可能会返回不同的类别，从当前到标准保留向后兼容性。In contrast, although the method usually reflects the current version of the Unicode standard, it might return a character's category based on a previous version of the standard, or it might return a category that differs from the current standard to preserve backward compatibility. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示了不同类型的字符为每个方法返回的值。The following code example shows the values returned by each method for different types of characters. [!code-cpp[System.Globalization.CharUnicodeInfo_Char#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.CharUnicodeInfo_Char/CPP/charunicodeinfo_char.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.CharUnicodeInfo_Char#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.CharUnicodeInfo_Char/CS/charunicodeinfo_char.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.CharUnicodeInfo_Char#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.CharUnicodeInfo_Char/VB/charunicodeinfo_char.vb#1)]

public static System.Globalization.UnicodeCategory GetUnicodeCategory (string s, int index);
.method public static hidebysig valuetype System.Globalization.UnicodeCategory GetUnicodeCategory(string s, int32 index) cil managed

param.name: s
param.span: 包含要获取其 Unicode 类别的 Unicode 字符的 。

span.span: The containing the Unicode character for which to get the Unicode category.

param.name: index

summary.span: 获取位于指定字符串的指定索引处的字符的 Unicode 类别。

span.span: Gets the Unicode category of the character at the specified index of the specified string.

returns.span: 指示位于指定字符串的指定索引处的字符类别的 值。

span.span: A value indicating the category of the character at the specified index of the specified string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类别划分为 Unicode 字符。The Unicode characters are divided into categories. 字符的类别是其属性之一。A character's category is one of its properties. 例如，字符可能是一个大写字母、 小写字母、 十进制数、 以字母数字、 连接符标点、 数学符号或货币符号。For example, a character might be an uppercase letter, a lowercase letter, a decimal digit number, a letter number, a connector punctuation, a math symbol, or a currency symbol. 类返回的 Unicode 字符类别。The class returns the category of a Unicode character. 有关 Unicode 字符的详细信息，请参阅[Unicode 标准](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37123)。For more information on Unicode characters, see the [Unicode Standard](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37123). 如果位置处的对象`index`第一个字符是有效的代理项对方法将返回而不是返回的代理项对的 Unicode 类别。If the object at position `index` is the first character of a valid surrogate pair, the method returns the Unicode category of the surrogate pair instead of returning . 例如，点滴字母表占用到 U + 1039F 码从 U + 10380。For example, the Ugaritic alphabet occupies code points U+10380 to U+1039F. 下面的示例使用方法可实例化一个字符串，表示 UGARITIC 字母 ALPA (从 U + 10380)，这是点滴字母表的第一个字母。The following example uses the method to instantiate a string that represents UGARITIC LETTER ALPA (U+10380), which is the first letter of the Ugaritic alphabet. 如示例所示，输出方法将返回如果它传递此字符，它指示它将代理项对的高代理项。As the output from the example shows, the method returns if it is passed the high surrogate of this character, which indicates that it considers the surrogate pair. 但是，如果它传递的低代理项，则它会考虑仅在隔离的低代理项并返回。However, if it is passed the low surrogate, it considers only the low surrogate in isolation and returns . [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.CharUnicodeInfo.GetUnicodeCategory#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.globalization.charunicodeinfo.getunicodecategory/cs/getunicodecategory1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.CharUnicodeInfo.GetUnicodeCategory#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.globalization.charunicodeinfo.getunicodecategory/vb/getunicodecategory1.vb#2)] 请注意，方法不会始终返回相同值作为方法时作为参数传递特定的字符。Note that method does not always return the same value as the method when passed a particular character as a parameter. 方法设计以反映当前版本的 Unicode 标准。The method is designed to reflect the current version of the Unicode standard. 与此相反，尽管方法通常反映当前版本的 Unicode 标准，它可能会返回的字符类别基于以前版本的标准，或它可能会返回不同的类别，从当前到标准保留向后兼容性。In contrast, although the method usually reflects the current version of the Unicode standard, it might return a character's category based on a previous version of the standard, or it might return a category that differs from the current standard to preserve backward compatibility. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示了不同类型的字符为每个方法返回的值。The following code example shows the values returned by each method for different types of characters. [!code-cpp[System.Globalization.CharUnicodeInfo_String#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.CharUnicodeInfo_String/CPP/charunicodeinfo_string.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.CharUnicodeInfo_String#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.CharUnicodeInfo_String/CS/charunicodeinfo_string.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.CharUnicodeInfo_String#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.CharUnicodeInfo_String/VB/charunicodeinfo_string.vb#1)]
